name: Safety Procedures: Lockout/Tagout
description: Ensures mandatory steps in safety procedures and conflict checks

theory.natural_language: Lockout/tagout requires de-energizing equipment, applying locks, and placing warning tags before maintenance. Bypassing lockout is prohibited. In emergencies, only the safety officer may authorize partial lockout. Technician Ray applied tags but did not de-energize. Technician Kim followed all steps. Safety officer Sam authorized partial lockout during an emergency.

queries.natural_language: Is Ray's maintenance compliant with lockout/tagout?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. Ray skipped de-energizing, violating the procedure.
expected_answer.explanation: lockout_tagout REQUIRES de_energize ∧ Ray SKIPPED de_energize

queries.natural_language: Did Kim follow the safety procedure?
Who can authorize partial lockout in emergencies?

expected_answer.natural_language: Only the safety officer, such as Sam, may authorize it.
expected_answer.explanation: emergency_partial_lockout MAY_BE_AUTHORIZED_BY safety_officer ∧ Sam IS_A safety_officer
